text: Danelle Im (born 21 January 1993) is a South Korean ice hockey player. ==Career== She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics as part of a unified team of 35 players drawn from both North and South Korea. The team's coach was Sarah Murray and the team was in Group B competing against Switzerland, Japan and Sweden. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian women's ice hockey forwards Category:Canadian sportspeople of Korean descent Category:Canadian people of South Korean descent Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of South Korea Category:South Korean women's ice hockey forwards Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Winter Olympics competitors for Korea
title: Danelle Im
